definition: season/the last month of a season/fourth or youngest amongst brothers/classifier for seasonal crop yields
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: The deck spits out a two-seven offsuit come playoff time.
sentences.chinese: 现在队伍中将会有两个七尺大个出现在季后赛了。

sentences.english: How Far Will the Oklahoma City Thunder Go in the Playoffs?
sentences.chinese: 雷霆队能在季后赛的征程中走多远？

sentences.english: As Camby continued, it was hard for him to hide his playoff disappointment.
sentences.chinese: 他显然不能掩盖他对这些年掘金季后赛表现的失望。

sentences.english: He has been called soft, with critics pointing to his 0-12 career playoff record.
sentences.chinese: 人们因为他在季后赛中0胜12负的记录称他为软蛋。

sentences.english: However, in the playoffs, their winning percentage has fallen precipitously .
sentences.chinese: 可是，到了季后赛，他们的胜率却突然下滑。

sentences.english: In 1974, teams traded home court after each playoff game.
sentences.chinese: 1974年，每场季后赛结束之后球队都要更换主场。

sentences.english: The Lakers have five regular-season games left before playoffs begin.
sentences.chinese: 湖人距离季后赛开始还有五场比赛。

sentences.english: The play-offs are a week away.
His Rockets never advanced further than the second round of the playoffs.
sentences.chinese: 他的火箭队从来没有跨过季后赛第二轮。

sentences.english: And once we got into the playoffs, it was getting past the first round.
sentences.chinese: 一旦我们进入季后赛，目标就变成了要过第一轮。

sentences.english: In Playoffs, if a draw occurs, MR3 will be played.
sentences.chinese: 在季后赛，如果平局出现，将会进行MR3的加赛。

sentences.english: It was a fact before James got there, during the regular season, and during the postseason.
sentences.chinese: 在勒布朗来之前就是这样，在常规赛，在季后赛。

sentences.english: What makes the NBA playoffs great is that they reveal the true nature of a team.
sentences.chinese: NBA季后赛的伟大之处在于，它揭示了团队的真谛。

sentences.english: Jarred for the first time with playoff desperation, those beautiful passes were junked.
sentences.chinese: 面对季后赛的首次失利，美好的时光已经过去。

sentences.english: All those things have to get better in the post-season, particularly against the Jazz or Spurs.
sentences.chinese: 季后赛火箭方方面面都要提升，尤其是打爵士或马刺。

definition: to seize the crown/fig. to win a championship/to win gold medal
horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
